One: I idolize a particular hero of my faith, and constantly refer to that person's deeds and example.
Two: I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies, empathizing with them and always working toward peace.
Three: I see omens in every event and action. The gods try to speak to us, we just need to listen.
Four: Nothing can shake my optimistic attitude.
Five: I quote (or misquote) sacred texts and proverbs in almost every situation.
Six: I am tolerant (or intolerant) of other faiths and respect (or condemn) the worship of other gods.
Seven: I've enjoyed fine food, drink, and high society among my temple's elite. Rough living grates on me.
Eight: I've spent so long in the temple that I have little practical experience dealing with people in the outside world.

One: I fall in and out of love easily, and am always pursuing someone.
Two: I have a joke for every occasion, especially occasions where humor is inappropriate.
Three: Flattery is my preferred trick for getting what I want.
Four: I'm a born gambler who can't resist taking a risk for a potential payoff.
Five: I lie about almost everything, even when there's no good reason to.
Six: Sacasm and insults are my weapons of choice.
Seven: I keep multiple holy symbols on me and invoke whatever deity might come in useful at any given moment.
Eight: I pocket anything I see that might have some value.

One: I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong.
Two: I am always calm, no matter what the situation. I never raise my voice or let my emotions control me.
Three: The first thing I do in a new place is note the locations of everything valuable - or where such things could be hidden.
Four: I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy.
Five: I am incredibly slow to trust. Those who seem the fairest often have the most to hide.
Six: I don't pay attention to the risks in a situation. Never tell me the odds.
Seven: The best way to get me to do something is to tell me I can't do it.
Eight: I blow up at the slightest insult.

One: I know a story relevant to almost every situation.
Two: Whenever I come to a new place, I collect local rumors and spread gossip.
Three: I'm a hopeless romantic, always searching for that "special someone."
Four: Nobody stays angry at me or around me for long, since I can defuse any amount of tension.
Five: I love a good insult, even one directed at me.
Six: I get bitter if I'm not the center of attention.
Seven: I'll settle for nothing less than perfection.
Eight: I change my mood or my mind as quickly as I change key in a song.

One: I judge people by their actions, not their words.
Two: If someone is in trouble, I'm always ready to lend help.
Three: When I set my mind to something, I follow through no matter what gets in my way.
Four: I have a strong sense of fair play and always try to find the most equitable solution to arguments.
Five: I'm confident in my own abilities and do what I can to instill confidence in others.
Six: Thinking is for other people. I prefer action.
Seven: I misuse long words in an attempt to sound smarter.
Eight: I get bored easily. When am I going to get on with my destiny?

One: I believe that anything worth doing is worth doing right. I can't help it - I'm a perfectionist.
Two: I'm a snob who looks down on those who can't appreciate fine art.
Three: I always want to know how things work and what makes people tick.
Four: I'm full of witty aphorisms and have a proverb for every occasion.
Five: I'm rude to people who lack my commitment to hard work and fair play.
Six: I like to talk at length about my profession.
Seven: I don't part with my money easily and will haggle tirelessly to get the best deal possible.
Eight: I'm well known for my work, and I want to make sure everyone appreciates it. I'm always taken aback when people haven't heard of me.
